column4: Hi :> I just ran sudo update-alternatives --config usplash-artwork.so to change it from the kubuntu splash to the ubuntu splash...when i shut down everything is okay, but when i reboot it boots up with the kubuntu splash?

That -would- be ideal, -if- the result of reporting bugs on launchpad wasn't 90% of the time "report it upstream" :> I haven't reported one bug against 9.10 yet that was even assigned to anybody, even after having them confirmed
